name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FunBlocks AI - Your Ultimate Writing and Reading Copilot

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Available anywhere. Write emails, optimize text, assist with writing, read articles, answer complex questions, boost thinking skills

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
Your AI Copilot powered by GPT-4o, Claude-3.5. Answers complex questions. Writes emails, reads articles, summary youtube, optimize writings. Usable everywhere.

We offer assistance in various tasks including researching, reading, writing, translating, exploration, critical thinking, and more.

💪 Key Features:
👉 Write:
  ✔️Compose: use 'compose' for quick, tailored writing of emails, blogs, social media posts, and more, with control over size, style, and tone.
  ✔️Write agent: provide a topic, and we'll auto-draft outlines with expanded content and references.
  ✔️Email reply: in Gmail/Outlook, we suggests reply options based on email content, allowing click-based responses without typing.
  ✔️Social reply: in popular social platform, we suggests reply options based on posts or comments, allowing click-based responses without typing.
  ✔️Grammar check: helps you find the words you need to write that tricky email, to get your point across, to keep your work moving.

👉Read and Summary
  ✔️Chat With Image: upload an image or screenshot and ask questions, powered by GPT-4V, Claude, and Gemini pro.
  ✔️Webpage Summary: get summaries and highlights without reading entire webpages.
  ✔️YouTube Summary: get summaries without watching entire videos.
  ✔️Error and Bias Detection: identify misinformation and biases for a more accurate understanding.
  ✔️Question Extraction: extract critical questions to deepen comprehension and thinking.

👉Translation
  ✔️Text Translation: translate selected text on webpages instantly.
  ✔️Writing Translation: write in your native language, then effortlessly polish and translate it into any language of your choice.

👉 Explore:
  ✔️AI Mind Flow: Elevate your thinking and creativity with AI-powered visual tools.
  ✔️Innovative Reading: Dive into articles and ideas using a mind-map approach, driven by LLM.
  ✔️Topic Breakdown: Receive AI-driven support for brainstorming and mastering any topic.
  ✔️Question Generation: Expand your thinking with AI-generated, insightful questions.
  ✔️Visual Exploration: Visually navigate and explore topics through intuitive mind-mapping tools.

👉 AI Memo:
  ✔️Memo is an AI knowledge base where you can save webpages, content clips, chats. It enable you save generated results from the AI assistant with a click. As it grows, we can offer more tailored and accurate responses for you.
  ✔️Further, at FunBlocks workspace, it offers a note-taking and writing experience similar to Notion.

👉 Prompt Library: 
  ✔️Customize your AI Assistant by writing or adding any prompts to your toolkit, making it your personal tailored assistant

🎯 Complimentary Access:
  ✔️Use FunBlocks AI Assistant for free if you have an API Key from any major LLM provider, including OpenAI ChatGPT 4, Anthropic Claude 3.5, Google Gemini 1.5 Pro, or Groq Mixtral-32k & Llama3.
  ✔️FunBlocks AI also provides ready-to-use LLM services—just log in to access them, with daily free usage limits.


💻 How to uses:
  🔸Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar.
  🔸Log in to your account.
  🔸Wake up FunBlocks at any page with text selection or from sidebar.
  🔸Start working with AI!

🔥 Benefits:
   ✔️Save time and effort by automating writing and reading tasks.
   ✔️Improve writing skills by learning from the AI's suggestions and examples.
   ✔️Communicate more effectively with clear, concise, and persuasive content.
   ✔️Become a more informed and critical reader, able to discern facts from opinions and misinformation.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
- No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a free account and then use with all mainstream LLMs, not limited to OpenAI ChatGPT.

📌 ChatGPT is banned in my country. Does it work in my country?
- Yes. Our extension works in all countries.

📌Is it free to use?
- Yes, we offer limited use for free. For unlimited access, you can choose the Premium Plan.
- Or, you can use it for free with your self-owned LLM API Keys from OpenAI GPTs, Claude, Gemini, Llama, or any OpenAI compatibles APIs.

📌Do I need to pay for using my own LLM API Key?
- No, you just pay the service provider for using their API Key, without any additional charges from this Extension. 

🔥 FunBlocks AI is the ultimate productivity tool for students, writers, researchers, and anyone who wants to study, work and communicate more effectively. It helps you think critically, understand and evaluate information wisely, communicate and express confidently.

📪 Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at feedbacks@funblocks.net
Try it now and experience the powerful features of LLM-driven AI assistants!
